name: The BAA-nishment factory
description:
You are a sheep, happily chomping on grass when you choked. A fat sheep thought you were laughing at him and called the BAA- nishment factory. So they caught you to be PUN-nished.

 Controls are A and D to move. 

R to restart. 

Esc for settings. 

M to mute. 

Click an animal to swap bodies. 

Yea. Enjoy!

For the mashup game jam. :)
